ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 cup butter, softened, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1  egg, 3  very ripe bananas
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 4g 20%, Cholesterol 39mg 13%, Sodium 238mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 53g 19%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 31g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 4mg 19%, Calcium 28mg 2%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 195mg 4%
